40.title: Temporary failure
40.details: The request has failed. Identical requests may succeed in the future.

41.title: Server unavailable
41.details: The server is unavailable due to overload or maintenance.

42.title: CGI Error
42.details: A dynamic content generator died unexpectedly or timed out.

43.title: Proxy Error
43.details: The server was unable to complete a transaction with the remote host.

50.title: Permanent error
50.details: The request has failed. The nature of the failure is permanent (identical requests will fail for the same reason).

51.title: Not found
51.details: The requested resource could not be found at this time.

52.title: Gone
52.details: The resource requested is no longer available and will not be available again.

53.title: Proxy request refused
53.details: The request was for a resource at a domain not served by the server and the server does not accept proxy requests.

59.title: Bad Request
59.details: The server was unable to parse the client's request.
